channel.itunes:author: Andy Low and David Palay
channel.itunes:keywords: random, access, rapodcast, geek, podcast, nerd, technology, news, interviews
channel.title: Random Access Podcast

item.title: Episode 56 - Laid Back
item.description: Your weekly tech update. A cameo appearence by Conspiracy Theory Dave...

item.title: Episode 55 - Meta-Title
item.description: Holy crap, a random set. Lots of apple actually.

item.title: Episode 54 - Laundry List
item.description: Dave has lots and lots of laundry.

item.title: Episode 53 - NCAA Madness!!!!
item.description: Sports! And you thought you had heard the end of it. Guess again.

item.title: Episode 52 - Andy's Time of the Month
item.description: NPD numbers are out. Andy goes nuts with them.

item.title: Episode 51 - New Continued Releases
item.description: The sequel plague hitting the movie theaters seems to be hitting software as well. Thankfully, software tends to IMPROVE with new versions, as opposed to movies...

item.title: Episode 50 - We're Back
item.description: We're back. Finally. It's been about two months since we've recorded, but Andy and I have finally started to get back onto a regular schedule.

item.title: Episode 49 - A Long Time Coming
item.description: Among other things, a brief recap of the entire year. Say goodbye to 2007.

item.title: Episode 48 - No
item.description: Andy uses some B.S. logic, and he's plain wrong. Also, new forums up. See the link from our main page.

item.title: Episode 47 - Outro
item.description: Apparently, we have an outro now, in addition to our intro. Lots of stuff considering a slow news week. More numbers, mostly, and a bit about Sony and JT.

item.title: Episode 46 - All Hail Ball
item.description: NPD numbers are out. Lots of rambling about random topics (hey, it's in the name). Random Topic: Create your own Team Fortress 2 level

item.title: Episode 45 - The Bet
item.description: The bet gets settled.... or not. Lots of tech news this week, as we ramp up to a huge batch of video game releases for the holidays. Oh, and we have a Steam Group! Random Topic: Most Versatile TF2 class

item.title: Episode 44 - Trick or Treat
item.description: Happy Halloween!!

item.title: Episode 42 - The Answer
item.description: Our forty-second episode. It is, of course, the answer.

item.title: Episode 41 - The Orange Box
item.description: ORANGE BOX

item.title: Episode 40 - Screwups
item.description: We have a del.icio.us page now! Come see what we're going to talk about at http://del.icio.us/RAPodcast

item.title: Episode 39 - Chaos
item.description:
I'm not too satisfied with this one, but Andy says it's what he heard on his end. I'm not sure we're going to be doing skype again for a while, but it was a neat experiment. Anyways, here you go!
Special Guest: Moe_Fwacky

item.title: Episode 38 - Conspiracy Theory
item.description: Andy's got computer problems this time. A small little product called the iPhone gets discussed, perhaps you have heard of it. Random Topic: Best Video Game RPG

item.title: Episode 37 - Addiction
item.description: We actually have news! First off, Andy and I both somehow suffered the Red Ring of Death within a week of eachother. Creepy. Random Topic: What're you addicted to

item.title: Episode 36 - Back From PAX
item.description: GAH!! I'm STILL burning at Appalachian State's win against the University of Michigan. Huge recap about the Penny Arcade Expo and some lightening-round gamer news! We're back!!!

item.title: Episode 35 - Back From Vacation
item.description: Lots of little news this week, several scandals and people who really kind of screwed up.

item.title: Episode 34 - Andy Named This Episode
item.description: We, for some odd reason, decided to record this episode with Mark from the CCST. The three of us talk about E3, Peter Moore... and this thing called the CCST.

item.title: Episode 33 - Segue
item.description: Omegathon games have been announced!

item.title: Episode 32 - So Tired
item.description: Oh God, So Tired....

item.title: Episode 31 - Omega-AWESOMENESS
item.description: Andy's media. Dave is Omeganaut. More info: www.pennyarcadeexpo.com

item.title: Episode 30 - i(Dislike)Macs
item.description: Mac episode! AHHH!!!

item.title: Episode 29 - A Random Title
item.description: Car woes, Steam numbers, and a completely dull title

item.title: Episode 28 - Arguments
item.description: Dave insults one of Andy's favorite authors, and it goes on from there...

item.title: Episode 27 - Protoss, Zerg, and Terran, Oh My!
item.description: Starcraft 2 baby!

item.title: Episode 26 - The Return of the Head to Head
item.description: And you thought it was gone...

enclosure.url: http://www.rapodcast.net/podcasts/2007-05-14 - Episode 26 - The Return of the Head to Head.mp3

item.link: http://www.rapodcast.net/podcasts/2007-05-14 - Episode 26 - The Return of the Head to Head.mp3

item.title: Episode 25 - I killed the Laptop
item.description:
My power is the touch of death.
D&D spiel followed by a huge recap of tech news!

item.title: Episode 24 - The Sleeping Giant
item.description: With the story like this: http://www.mlive.com/news/aanews/index.ssf?/base/news-22/1175325176174040.xml&coll=2 and this: http://www.mlive.com/news/aanews/index.ssf?/base/news-22/1175928420156530.xml&coll=2 happening in our own backyard, Andy and I did some digging. The result? An interview with the young Mr. Wigal himself.

item.title: Episode 23 - The White Board
item.description: W00t! Andy brought over a white board. Even more W00t! Jack Thompson! Hurrah.

item.title: Episode 22 - Pi Dubs
item.description: Happy Pi day everyone! Did you do a pi dance at 1:59 am? Get it, 3.14159?

item.title: Episode 21 - Spring Break
item.description: Yahoooo! Spring break! Yeahhhh! RPG talk and a spring break summary Breaking news! (when we recorded) Comp USA store closings How did Sony screw up this week? WoW talk (been a looonnng time) And, of course, the random topic: Making a video game.

item.title: Episode 20 - Movie Madness
item.description: A surprise opening! Boo-ya! Welcome back everyone, sorry it's been so long since our last recording. In the Episode: How Sony Screwed Up! (Again) The great return of Jack Thompson. Lots and lots of movie titles in a rather random (go figure) diversion from the norm. Random Topic: Paper clips?

item.title: Episode 19 - The Big Three
item.description: Next Gen Roundup! News from the three biggies: Microsoft, Sony, and Nintendo. Some other fun stuff thrown into it too. Random Topic: Eating Gluten!! W00t!

item.title: Episode 18 - The Witching Hour
item.description: We return after a long absence with Episode 18! And yes, Dave has hung out with witches. No, he has not partaken in any rituals. We go back to our roots with the randomness in this one, so enjoy! Random Topic: Reasoning behind Fellowship of the Rings.

item.title: Episode 17 - CES Fest
item.description: Lots of info with CES! The show had nothing really big, but Macworld was at hte same time. We talk about both. Random Topic: C++ v. Java

item.title: Episode 16 - Goatse 4 All
item.description: Internet Hijinks and the new gamer conference. Give it a listen. WARNING: Contains references to NSFW topics

item.title: Episode 15 - Kosher
item.description: Andy doesn't know the Picard Song!! He fails. Dave tries to sing it for him. He fails too. Random Topic: Are humans red meat / kosher? (This was seriously asked to me by a person I know... long story)

item.title: Episode 14 - Wii Have the Power
item.description: Monkeys in tuxedos! Andy and I do some random ramblings, go the news. Some big things. Random Topic: Time Loops

item.title: Episode 13 - Wii-actions
item.description: Wiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii....... and plenty of it. Wii gots us our wiis! Hear all about it! And... some other stuff I suppose.... Like Walruses.. walrusai.... whatever.

item.title: Episode 12 - Thanksgiving Recap
item.description: Serious discussion about the intro, but that's pretty much the only seriousness. Lots of Wii talk, and the Random Topic: Boba Fett.

item.title: Episode 11 - Culinary Delights
item.description: Recap of the TWL. Scary shit with the launch of two new game consoles. Finalization - sort of - of the head2head competition. Random Topic: Gamer food.

item.title: Episode 10 - TLW: Three Letter Weekend
item.description: The Wii, PS3, 007, and many more. Andy and Dave catch up on some upcoming game news and other hilarious hijinks.

item.title: Episode 9 - Election Day Extravaganza
item.description: Election day! We spend a little time talking about politics (not much, honest). And then there's some stuff about buying a laptop. Random Topic: Bruce Campbell

item.title: Episode 8 - Greatness
item.description: Happy Halloween all! For your listening pleasure, we've started a "discussion" about what can be considered "Greatness". Thus the title, clever eh? Also, Batman v. Lex Luthor in WoW.

item.title: Episode 7 - The Sickness
item.description: *cough* *wheeze* Listen to Dave's scratchy voice as he and Andy talk about tech news as well as our old friend Jack Thompson. Oh, and there's a bit about knitting and driving a stick shift too.

item.title: Episode 6 - Sports Talk RAP Style
item.description: Dave's rant about Baseball and the Detroit Sports Syndrom. We also cover the brand new Random Topic of the Week. This weeks RTotW: Bobby Pins. And then there's some stuff about Jack Thompson.

item.title: Episode 5 - Big Brother
item.description: From naming your computer to Jack Thompson being shot for crossing state lines, we valiant podcasters attempt to entertain the masses once more.

item.title: Episode 4 - Soothsaying
item.description: Answers to the question of "What will the future bring?" We try to do our best to answer, and also get a few random things in there.

item.title: Episode 3 - H4xx0rz
item.description: Your two valiant hosts doing their best to broaden your horizons, whether you like it or not.

item.itunes:author: David Palay and Andy Low
item.title: Episode 2 - Beeping Jack Thompson
item.description: Ahh, Jack Thompson. He's actually a relatively minor player in this broadcast, taking a back seat to a faculty strike at Eastern Michigan University, Facebook, the PS3, and our generally witty humor.

item.itunes:author: David Palay and Andy Low
item.title: Episode 1.5 - An Apology
item.description: No, we're not dead. But this is why Episode 2 won't be up for a few days yet. Sorry all. -Dave

item.itunes:author: David Palay and Andy Low
item.title: Episode 1 - The Crappy Green
item.description: The first true episode wherein our valient heros discuss themselves, the future of RAPodcast, PAX, and more! (even a bit about LARPers)

item.itunes:author: David Palay and Andy Low
item.title: Episode 0.0 The Ultra Crappy Vendor Fodder
item.description: This is the first broadcast of the Random Access Podcast, and is being sent out more as an outtake than as a serious episode. Hear the effort of starting a podcast.
